ygData.subject: Charm
ygData.msgSnippet: Im about to mess around with charm. Im almost level 12 :) I played a wizard to level 34 and got bored of blast... blast again.. what next to do maybe.. hmm I
ygData.messageBody:
Im about to mess around with charm. Im almost level 12 :) I played a wizard
to level 34 and got bored of blast... blast again.. what next to do maybe..
hmm I know blast!!!! hehehee Well as I was saying I noticed at level 12 my
root for my wizard got resisted allot! At level 12 can I charm anything to
make it worth it?

Also I have no EXP with useing a charm spell. Other then you know your pet
is going to want to kill you soon enough.. hehehehehe Ant insight on what to
do, and how I will be effected?

P.S. I am told that Tashan can help not only to stop your char from getting
resisted but it also lenghens the time you hold the charm? Is this Bull to
put it lightly :)

Thanks for puting up with my newbe questions :) and all the responce from my
last posting. You seem like a frendly bunch :)
